member.name: T:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo
member.summary: A container struct for all SkinDef and SkinDefParams data. Use this to set skinDef values, then call CreateNewSkinDef(). Leave SkinDefParams null to create one automatically with the given arrays. If SkinDefParams is not null, the arrays will be ignored and the SkinDefParams fields will take priority.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.Name
member.summary: Unity's internal name. Don't use spaces, cannot be null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.NameToken
member.summary: NameToken used for localization, or the user visible name if not found. Don't use spaces, cannot be null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.Icon
member.summary: Icon associated with the skin.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.UnlockableDef
member.summary: UnlockableDef associated with the skin.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.RootObject
member.summary: Root CharacterModel object.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.BaseSkins
member.summary: The skins which will be applied before this one.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.SkinDefParams
member.summary: Leave null to create this automatically.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.RendererInfos
member.summary: Used when SkinDefParams is null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.MeshReplacements
member.summary: Used when SkinDefParams is null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.GameObjectActivations
member.summary: Used when SkinDefParams is null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.ProjectileGhostReplacements
member.summary: Used when SkinDefParams is null.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo.MinionSkinReplacements
member.summary: Used when SkinDefParams is null.

member.name: T:R2API.SkinIDRS
member.summary: Class for adding Skin Specific ItemDisplayRuleSets for skin defs.

member.name: M:R2API.SkinIDRS.AddPair(RoR2.SkinDef,RoR2.ItemDisplayRuleSet)
member.summary:
Adds a pair of SkinDef and ItemDisplayRuleSet
Ingame, once the Skin is applied to the model, the default IDRS will be swapped for the one specified in
member.returns: True if added succesfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:R2API.SkinIDRS.AddGroupOverride(RoR2.SkinDef,UnityEngine.Object,RoR2.DisplayRuleGroup)
member.summary: Adds a displayRuleGroup override for ItemDef/EquipmentDef. If there was no IDRS for the skin, a clone of the IDRS from CharacterModel from a body prefab will be taken as base.
member.param: ItemDef/EquipmentDef

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.CreateNewSkinDef(R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new SkinDef from a SkinDefInfo.
member.param: Will be used to populate the SkinDef

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.CreateNewSkinDef(R2API.SkinDefInfo)
member.summary: Use instead

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.AddSkinToCharacter(UnityEngine.GameObject,R2API.SkinDefParamsInfo)
member.summary: Adds a skin to the body prefab for a character. Will attempt to create a default skin if one is not present. Must be called during plugin Awake or OnEnable. If called afterwards the new skins must be added to bodycatalog manually.
member.param: The body to add the skin to
The SkinDefInfo for the skin to add

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.AddSkinToCharacter(UnityEngine.GameObject,R2API.SkinDefInfo)
member.summary: Use instead

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.AddSkinToCharacter(UnityEngine.GameObject,RoR2.SkinDef)
member.summary: Adds a skin to the body prefab for a character. Will attempt to create a default skin if one is not present. Must be called during plugin Awake or OnEnable. If called afterwards the new skins must be added to bodycatalog manually.
member.param: The body to add the skin to
The SkinDef to add

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.CreateSkinIcon(UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Creates a skin icon sprite styled after the ones already in the game.
member.param: The color of the top portion
The color of the right portion
The color of the bottom portion
The color of the left portion

member.name: M:R2API.Skins.CreateSkinIcon(UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color,UnityEngine.Color)

member.name: T:R2API.SkinVFX
member.summary: Class for adding skin-specific effect replacements for SkinDefs.

member.name: T:R2API.SkinVFX.OnEffectSpawnedDelegate
member.summary: Called when a skin-specific effect is ready to be modified.
member.param: The effect that was spawned.

member.name: M:R2API.SkinVFX.AddSkinVFX(RoR2.SkinDef,RoR2.EffectIndex,UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Adds a skin-specific effect replacement.
member.param: The SkinDef that should be required for the replacement to occur.
The EffectIndex of the effect that should be replaced.
A replacement prefab to spawn instead of the effect. To modify the normal prefab, see the overload with OnEffectSpawnedDelegate.
member.returns: The SkinVFXInfo created from the input.

member.name: M:R2API.SkinVFX.AddSkinVFX(RoR2.SkinDef,System.String,UnityEngine.GameObject)
member.summary: Adds a skin-specific effect replacement.
member.param: The SkinDef that should be required for the replacement to occur.
The name of the effect that should be replaced.
A delegate that will be called when the effect is spawned by a character with a matching SkinDef.
member.returns: The SkinVFXInfo created from the input.

member.param: The SkinDef that should be required for the replacement to occur.
The the effect that should be replaced.
A delegate that will be called when the effect is spawned by a character with a matching SkinDef.

member.name: M:R2API.SkinVFX.AddSkinVFX(R2API.SkinVFXInfo)
member.summary: Adds a skin-specific effect replacement.
member.param: The SkinVFXInfo to register. Its Identifier field will be automatically assigned by this method.

member.name: T:R2API.SkinVFXInfo
member.summary: A container struct for a skin-specific VFX. When the specified VFX would be spawned and the spawner's SkinDef matches, it will be modified by the values here. Call AddSkinVFX() to register this.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.RequiredSkin
member.summary: SkinDef required before this replacement is applied.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.TargetEffect
member.summary: EffectIndex of the effect that should be replaced.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.ReplacementEffectPrefab
member.summary: A replacement prefab to spawn instead of the effect. This will be used instead of OnEffectSpawn if assigned.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.OnEffectSpawned
member.summary: A delegate that will be called when the effect is spawned by a character with a matching SkinDef.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.Identifier
member.summary: An identifier used to track whether or not this effect met the skin condition. This will be automatically assigned, and shouldn't be modified.

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.EffectPrefab
member.summary: The prefab of the effect that should be replaced. This will automatically fill out TargetEffect on EffectCatalog.Init

member.name: F:R2API.SkinVFXInfo.EffectString
member.summary: The name of the effect that should be replaced. This will automatically fill out TargetEffect on EffectCatalog.Init

member.name: T:R2API.AutoVersionGen.AutoVersionAttribute
member.summary: Add a PluginVersion field to the attribut-ed class filled from the thunderstore.toml versionNumber field
